A

apply(Statement, Description) - Method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerRule
Modifies the method-running Statement to implement this test-running rule.
assertDNExists(String) - Method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Assert that an entry identified by dn exists.
assertDNHasAttribute(String, String) - Method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Assert that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName.
assertDNHasAttributeValue(String, String, String...) - Method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Assert that the entry identified by dn has an attribute named attributeName with the attribute value(s) attributeName.
assertDNIsA(String, String) - Method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Assert that the entry identified by dn is of type objectclass.

C

com.btmatthews.ldapunit - package com.btmatthews.ldapunit
The implementation of the LDAPUnit.

D

DirectoryServerConfiguration - Annotation Type in com.btmatthews.ldapunit
This annotation is used to specify the parameters used to configure the LDAP directory server.
DirectoryServerRule - Class in com.btmatthews.ldapunit
A JUnit test rule that starts an embedded LDAP directory server.
DirectoryServerRule() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerRule
 
DirectoryServerStatement - Class in com.btmatthews.ldapunit
A Statement wrapper that launches an embedded LDAP directory server before executing the wrapped statement.
DirectoryServerStatement(Statement, DirectoryServerConfiguration) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerStatement
Initialise the wrapper statement that starts an embedded LDAP directory server and shuts it down before and after executing the wrapped statement.
DirectoryServerUtils - Class in com.btmatthews.ldapunit
Helper functions to start the in-memory LDAP directory server, load LDAP directory entries from an LDIF files and shut down the in-memory LDAP directory server.
DirectoryServerUtils() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerUtils
 
DirectoryTester - Class in com.btmatthews.ldapunit
Utility that maintains a connection to the LDAP directory server and provides assert and verify methods to test the LDAP directory contents.
DirectoryTester() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Initialise the LDAP directory tester using the default hostname of localhost and port number of 10389.
DirectoryTester(String, int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port.
DirectoryTester(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port.The connection attempt is retried a maximum of retries times with a timeout of timeout for each attempt.
DirectoryTester(String, int, String, String) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port and bind to it using the bindDN and password.
DirectoryTester(String, int, String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Initialise the LDAP directory tester by connecting to the LDAP directory server using the hostname and port and bind to it using the bindDN and password.
DirectoryTesterException - Exception in com.btmatthews.ldapunit
Runtime exception raised by DirectoryTester when there is a problem communicating with the LDAP directory server.
DirectoryTesterException() - Constructor for exception com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTesterException
The default constructor.
DirectoryTesterException(String) - Constructor for exception com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTesterException
Construct a DirectoryTesterException with an message describing the source of the exception.
DirectoryTesterException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTesterException
Construct a DirectoryTesterException with a root cause.
DirectoryTesterException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTesterException
Construct a DirectoryTesterException with an message describing the source of the exception and a root cause.
disconnect() - Method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryTester
Disconnect from the LDAP directory server.

E

evaluate() - Method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerStatement
Start an embedded LDAP directory server before executing the wrapped statement and shutdown the LDAP directory server after the wrapped statement completes.

L

loadData(InMemoryDirectoryServer, String) - Static method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerUtils
Load LDIF records from a file to seed the LDAP directory.

S

startServer(int, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerUtils
Create and configure an embedded LDAP directory server, load seed data and start the server.
stopServer(InMemoryDirectoryServer) - Static method in class com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerUtils
Shutdown the embedded LDAP directory server.
